Due to the Covid-19 Pandemic, we are suspending the sale of reserve football tickets. UIL has instructed us to limit the Stadium capacity to half of the total seating capacity. Away games will be determined by the host school and we will be notified in advance as to how many fans will be allowed in. When we receive the away game information we will let you know how this process will work. The scrimmage on August 21st will be free and we will be monitoring at the gates. I don’t anticipate the crowd level being over half capacity at the scrimmage. I hope everyone can understand the situation that we are in and can be glad that our students are getting to participate. We look forward to a successful season. Go Bold Gold.

As the new Elementary will be finished soon, we will be posting several items of surplus up for sale. We are likely going to have a huge sale at some point and time, but we are also going to try something new. Some items will be listed on www.publicsurplus.com . The items will be listed for several days and may be bid on, similar to an ebay auction.

You will need to create an account to be able to bid on an item. This will allow you to pay directly to us in cash or money order, or by credit card, on the site. We have only one item listed at the moment, to get the feel of it. Please sign up and check often for new items.

We will try to post on the Facebook "Post ISD Surplus Property" page when we list new items. Please like that page to get notifications.

Happy bidding! :)
